item.title: Game Changer Box Office Day 4 (All Languages): Unlocks The 100 Crore Club, Becomes 3rd Ram Charan Film To Achieve The Mark! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Day 4 (All Languages): Unlocks The 100 Crore Club, Becomes 3rd Ram Charan Film To Achi

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

The political action thriller, Game Changer, co-starring Kiara Advani, directed by Shankar, has officially entered the 100 crore club in India, marking a significant achievement for Ram Charan.

  • Day 1: 54 crores
  • Day 2: 22 crores
  • Day 3: 18.8 crores
  • Day 4: 7.85 crores

Total: 102.65 crores

“Game Changer has now officially entered the 100 crore club.”

As it continues to gain popularity, it is poised to surpass the lifetime earnings of Ram Charan’s previous works.

item.title: Fateh Box Office Collection Day 4: Sonu Sood’s Film Is Leading The Race Against Bollywood’s First Release Of 2024! - Koimoi
item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 4: Sonu Sood’s Film Is Leading The Race Against Bollywood’s First

Publication Date: N/A | Source: Koimoi

Sonu Sood and Jacqueline Fernandez starrer Fateh is the first Bollywood release of 2025. It arrived in theatres alongside Ram Charan’s Game Changer, which is also performing well. Fateh experienced a significant drop in box office earnings on Monday.

Suffers huge fall on Monday

Fateh started strong with earnings of 2.61 crores but saw a big decline on Monday, earning only 1.50 crores* which is a 63% drop from 4.13 crores on Sunday.

Take a look at the day-wise box office breakdown below:

  • Day 1: 2.61 crores
  • Day 2: 3.97 crores
  • Day 3: 4.13 crores
  • Day 4: 1.50 crores (estimates)

Total: 12.21 crores*

Fateh vs Merry Christmas (4-Day Total)

Compared to Merry Christmas, Fateh has outperformed with a total of 12.21 crores* against 10.65 crores for its competitor.

Box office numbers are based on estimates and various sources. Numbers have not been independently verified by Koimoi.

Stay tuned for more box office updates.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan calling comparison with Hrithik Roshan ‘shameless’, Rakesh Roshan getting shot: Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai at 25 - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shah Rukh Khan calling comparison with Hrithik Roshan ‘shameless’, Rakesh Roshan getting shot: Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai at 25

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

This article reflects on the impact of the film Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai on Bollywood, marking 25 years since its release and the ensuing stardom of Hrithik Roshan, alongside Shah Rukh Khan's remarks on their comparisons and significant family events.

  • Shah Rukh Khan expressed disdain for comparisons with Hrithik Roshan, calling them 'shameless'.
  • Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai was a pivotal film in Hrithik Roshan's career, leading to a significant stardom debut.
  • Rakesh Roshan was shot shortly after his son's film became a massive success, highlighting challenges faced by filmmakers.
  • The rivalry between Hrithik Roshan and Shah Rukh Khan during this period was well noted, causing tension in the industry.
  • The film and Hrithik's debut changed dynamics in Bollywood, emphasizing the evolution of stardom.
“I entered as a nobody and when I came out, there was hysteria all around me.” - Hrithik Roshan

The article delves into the changing landscape of Bollywood stardom and the personal challenges faced by the Roshan family amidst rising fame.

item.title: Inside Karan Johar Rs 30 Crore Sea-Facing Duplex In Mumbai: Opulence, Luxury, And Modern Decor Pieces - News18
item.description:
Inside Karan Johar’s Rs 30 Crore Sea-Facing Duplex in Mumbai

Publication Date: January 14, 2025
Source: News18

Karan Johar's luxurious duplex in Bandra, Mumbai, reflects his opulent lifestyle. The 8000-square-foot apartment is valued at Rs 30 crore and was recently showcased by his friend Farah Khan on her YouTube channel.

  • The house features a modern staircase connecting its floors.
  • It includes a bar area that has hosted Bollywood stars like Deepika Padukone and Shah Rukh Khan.
  • Features a unique 'copper washroom' stocked with 'tiffin boxes' for guests.
  • The kitchen boasts metallic accents and the latest gadgets.
  • Sections of the home were designed by Gauri Khan, blending comfort and modern aesthetics.
  • The living room has expansive glass windows providing stunning city views.
  • The terrace is designed for gatherings with outdoor furniture and greenery.
“Hi guys, welcome to not my house. Today, we have come to Karan Johar’s home, and he is not home right now.” - Farah Khan

Johar's residence stands as a testament to his style, offering a blend of luxury and comfort that reflects his personality.

item.title: Hospital Photos, Account Locked Amid Divorce: How 'Brad Pitt' Scammed Woman - NDTV
item.description:
French Woman Scammed by Fake Brad Pitt for 800,000 Euros

Publication Date: Not specified Source: TF1

A French woman was deceived into believing she was in a relationship with actor Brad Pitt and lost 800,000 euros to a scammer using AI-generated images and messages.

  • The scammer contacted her on Instagram posing as Brad Pitt and his mother.
  • The victim, Anne, who was going through a divorce, was drawn in by romantic messages and declarations of love.
  • The scammer avoided voice calls while sending manipulated videos and images.
  • After Anne's divorce, the scammer claimed to need money for medical treatment, further escalating the scam.
  • The fraud was uncovered when Anne realized the deception upon seeing news about Pitt's actual relationships.
“There are so few men who write such things. I liked the man I was talking to and he knew how to talk to women,” said Anne.

This case highlights the dangers of online scams and the emotional vulnerability that can be exploited.

item.title: ‘Meri 2 din ki chutti cancel ho gayi’: Anupamaa’s Shivam Khajuria says he is NOT the PET of Rajan Shahi - India Forums
item.description:
Anupamaa Actor Shivam Khajuria Denies Being Rajan Shahi's Pet

Published: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 10:06 AM

In a recent media interaction, Shivam Khajuria, the lead actor of Anupamaa, addressed rumors claiming he is producer Rajan Shahi's 'pet' and firmly denied these allegations.

  • Shivam emphasized that he has been working the hardest on the Anupamaa set.
  • He expressed disappointment as he had a 2-day leave that got canceled.
  • Claims of favoritism were dismissed by Shivam, who stated he does not consider himself as anyone's pet.

Aisa mujhe koi idea nahi hai ke maante hai. Main toh ye bolunga ki sabse jyda toh main hi kaam kar raha hoon wahan pe. Meri adjustment thi 2 din ki wo cancel hogayi. Mujhe agar pet maante hote toh mujhe chutti bhi mil jaati.

- Shivam Khajuria

Shivam also mentioned respect for Rajan Shahi, indicating a positive professional relationship.

item.title: Pic: Prabhas Exudes Vintage Charm in 'The Raja Saab'.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Prabhas Exudes Vintage Charm in 'The Raja Saab' Poster

Publication Date: Tuesday
Source: Great Andhra

A new festive poster from the upcoming film ‘The Raja Saab’ was unveiled on the occasion of Sankranthi and Pongal. The poster showcases Prabhas in an uber-cool yet vintage festive avatar, as he radiates a delightful, celebratory vibe, offering a sneak peek into the film’s unique horror-comedy world.

  • Prabhas plays a man drawn back to his ancestral property, encountering a vengeful spirit.
  • This is his second film after the success of ‘Kalki: 2898 AD’.
  • The film is directed by Maruthi, a pioneer in the horror-comedy genre in Telugu cinema.
  • Produced by Viswa Prasad under the People Media Factory banner.
  • The film will release in five languages: Telugu, Hindi, Tamil, Kannada, and Malayalam.
“His vintage avatar, reminiscent of the Prabhas fans adored in his earlier days.”

Last year, Prabhas launched The Script Craft, a platform to encourage writers by allowing them to share their story ideas and gain visibility.

item.title: Netflix secures streaming rights for upcoming Telugu movies - 123telugu
item.description:
Netflix secures streaming rights for upcoming Telugu movies

Published on Jan 14, 2025 by OTT Updates

This Sankranthi, Netflix has announced an exciting lineup of Telugu films for which it has acquired streaming rights, including anticipated titles like Pawan Kalyan’s They Call Him OG and Naveen Polishetty’s Anaganaga Oka Raju.

  • They Call Him OG
  • VD 12
  • HIT: The Third Case
  • Thandel
  • MAD Square
  • Mass Jathara
  • Jack
  • Court: State Vs A Nobody
  • Anaganaga Oka Raju

The films will premiere on Netflix, with some having pan-Indian releases while others will be available in major South Indian languages.

Conclusion: This expansion of content aims to attract a wider audience and enhance Netflix’s offerings in regional cinema.

item.title: Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani tie the knot in a stunning beachside wedding in Goa: A timeline of their relationship - The Indian Express
item.description:
Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani tie the knot in a stunning beachside wedding in Goa

Publication Date: January 14, 2025
Source: Indian Express

Aadar Jain, grandson of actor Raj Kapoor, and childhood friend Alekha Advani celebrated their wedding in a beautiful Christian ceremony on the beaches of Goa.

  • The wedding was characterized by white-themed decor and elegant floral arrangements that reflected the serene coastal beauty.
  • The couple exchanged vows in an intimate ceremony attended by family members.
  • Alekha wore a stunning white gown adorned with pearls, and Aadar looked dapper in a grey suit.
  • The celebration included memorable moments, such as family walk-downs and a multi-tiered wedding cake.

Their Love Story

The couple went public with their relationship in November 2023, marking the beginning of their journey together. Aadar proposed in September 2024, calling Alekha his 'first crush' and 'best friend.'

The Bride’s Background

Alekha is the daughter of businessman Harry Advani and has strong ties within Bollywood, maintaining family values while rising in the industry.

item.title: Rasha Thadani reacts to comparison with Janhvi Kapoor, Khushi Kapoor and Suhana Khan: ‘I can actually learn from them’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rasha Thadani, Raveena Tandon's daughter, prepares for her Bollywood debut in Azaad, addressing comparisons with Janhvi Kapoor, Khushi Kapoor, and Suhana Khan.

Date: Jan 14, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Rasha Thadani, the daughter of Raveena Tandon, is set to make her Bollywood debut in the film Azaad. She recently spoke about being compared to established stars Janhvi Kapoor, Khushi Kapoor, and Suhana Khan.

  • Rasha Thadani is promoted as a new entrant in Bollywood with her debut in Azaad.
  • She acknowledges the experience of Janhvi, Khushi, and Suhana, stating she has much to learn from them.
  • Rasha gained attention for her performance in a dance number that was compared to Katrina Kaif's famous choreography.
  • Azaad is a historical drama directed by Abhishek Kapoor, featuring notable actors like Ajay Devgn and Diana Penty.
  • The film will be released in theaters on January 17.
“I think they are all more experienced than me. They have done more work than I have... So, I think there's something I can actually learn from them.” - Rasha Thadani

The upcoming film Azaad marks a significant entry for Rasha Thadani in the competitive Bollywood landscape, where she hopes to carve out her own path while learning from her peers.

item.title: Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box Office Day 1 Prediction: Career-Best Opening Loading For Victory Venkatesh! - Koimoi
item.description:
Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box Office Day 1 Prediction: Career-Best Opening Loading For Victory Venkatesh!

Publication Date: Not specified   Source: Koimoi

The final release of Sankranti featuring Venkatesh is poised for a remarkable opening at the Indian box office, predicted to achieve record pre-sales.

  • Directed by Anil Ravipudi, the film has built significant hype through its successful trailer and hit songs.
  • Day 1 pre-sales have surpassed 12 crore, indicating strong audience interest.
  • With high occupancy of around 50% in advance bookings, the film is expected to gross 21-24 crore net on its opening day.
  • If successful, it will surpass Venkatesh's previous record of 15.60 crore set by F3.
“Today, it will be dethroned comfortably.”

Sankranthiki Vasthunam is expected to set new benchmarks for Victory Venkatesh at the box office, heralding a successful festive release.

item.title: Anshu Ambani reacts to Trinadha Rao Nakkina's apology for commenting on her size, says he treated her like family - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Anshu Ambani addresses Trinadha Rao Nakkina's apology for body comments

Publication Date: Jan 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Director Trinadha Rao Nakkina publicly apologised to actor Anshu Ambani after receiving backlash for inappropriate comments made about her body at the teaser launch of their film, Mazakka. Anshu has urged fans to focus on the film rather than the controversy.

  • Trinadha Rao Nakkina made comments regarding Anshu Ambani's body size at the teaser launch of Mazakka, leading to public outcry.
  • Anshu Ambani downplayed the comments, suggesting they were taken out of context and praised Nakkina's treatment of her during filming.
  • Nakkina issued an apology, acknowledging that his comments were inappropriate and hurt some individuals.
“I really want to assure you all that he's the loveliest man on the planet... he has treated me as a member of his family.” - Anshu Ambani

This incident highlights ongoing conversations about body image and respect in the film industry.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan vs Hrithik Roshan: Dalip Tahil reveals difference between stardom of Bollywood's biggest and last star - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Dalip Tahil Discusses the Stardom Journeys of Shah Rukh Khan and Hrithik Roshan

Publication Date: Jan 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Dalip Tahil shares insights on the contrasting stardom journeys of Bollywood icons Shah Rukh Khan and Hrithik Roshan, emphasizing their different paths to fame.

  • Tahil notes that Shah Rukh Khan's rise involved several hit films over the years, starting with Deewana and reaching a peak with Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge.
  • In contrast, Hrithik Roshan's debut film Kaho Naa Pyar Hai catapulted him to immediate stardom.
  • Hrithik is recognized for achieving remarkable success right from his first film, which made him an overnight sensation.
  • Tahil reflects on his own experience working with both actors, highlighting the unique strengths each brought to their craft.
“Shah Rukh had stepping stones with these films. But Hrithik got to that stage in his first (film).”

In conclusion, the journeys of these two stars illustrate the varied paths to success in the film industry, showcasing different forms of talent and audience reception.

item.title: 'Game Changer' box office collection day 4: The Ram Charan starrer slows down on first Monday, expected t - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Game Changer' Box Office Collection Day 4

Publication Date: January 14, 2023 | Source: Times of India

'Game Changer', released on January 10, 2023, experienced a notable drop in box office collection on its first Monday, managing to collect only Rs 7.61 crore, bringing its four-day total to Rs 96.65 crore.

  • The film had a strong opening day with Rs 52 crore but saw a decline thereafter.
  • On Sunday, the movie earned Rs 15.9 crore, marking a significant fall.
  • Monday's earnings included Rs 5.12 crore from Telugu, Rs 1.83 crore from Hindi, and Rs 66 lakh from Tamil.
  • Despite expectations to cross Rs 100 crore by day four, it fell short amid ticket price increases being retracted by the Telangana Government.
  • Upcoming releases like Kangana Ranaut's 'Emergency' may impact 'Game Changer's performance.
“The total collection of the movie so far, in the span of 4 days, is Rs 96.65 crore.”

The future prospects for 'Game Changer' now seem uncertain with competing releases ahead and a declining trend in its box office numbers.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Ashika ruins SaRaj's moment, puts Sai in danger - India Forums
item.description:
Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Ashika ruins SaRaj's moment, puts Sai in danger

Published: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 5:04 AM | Source: Star Plus

The latest episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin reveals Sai in dire danger, causing great concern for her loved ones, as Ashika's interference threatens to ruin SaRaj's blossoming relationship.

  • Sai faces grave danger in an upcoming episode.
  • Savi intends to share her pregnancy news with Rajat during a romantic outing.
  • Ashika, seeking to reunite with Rajat, schemes against Savi.
  • She endangers her daughter Sai during a fair ride, creating a tense situation.
  • Rajat and Savi rush to save Sai as she dangles from a dangerous ride.
“The critical question now is whether Rajat will succeed in saving Sai's life.”

This dramatic turn of events highlights the conflict between Ashika's desires and the growing bond between Savi and Rajat, raising stakes in the narrative of the show.

item.title: Amitabh Bachchan Calmed Rekha, Told Her 'It's Just Acting' During 'I Hate You' Scene: 'I Hugged Amitji...' - News18
item.description:
Amitabh Bachchan Calmed Rekha, Told Her 'It's Just Acting' During 'I Hate You' Scene: 'I Hugged Amitji...'

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: News18

During the filming of the iconic movie Silsila, Rekha faced immense pressure while shooting a crucial scene. Amitabh Bachchan provided her with encouragement, drawing on the story of James Dean to help her focus.

  • Rekha described an intense scene where she had to deliver emotional lines in front of 15,000 people.
  • Amitabh Bachchan interjected with a story to calm her nerves.
  • Rekha recounted the crowd's reaction after the scene, highlighting the emotional atmosphere.
  • The pair's on-screen chemistry has led to ongoing speculation about their relationship.
“I said to Amitji, ‘Excuse me, that really makes me feel better.’ He said, ‘I don’t mean it literally, but you know what I mean, come on. This is acting’.”

The filming of Silsila remains a significant moment in the careers of Amitabh Bachchan and Rekha, revealing the pressure actors can face and the supportive relationships that can develop on set.

item.title: Madhuri Dixit buys swanky Ferrari worth ₹6 crore, goes for a ride around Mumbai with husband Shriram Nene. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Madhuri Dixit Buys Luxury Ferrari Worth ₹6 Crore

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Madhuri Dixit and her husband, Dr. Shriram Nene, have recently acquired a new Ferrari 296 GTS, marking a significant addition to their luxury car collection.

  • The car, worth over ₹6 crore, is a two-seater Coupe known for its performance and design.
  • Madhuri was spotted taking the car for a ride around Mumbai with her husband.
  • The Ferrari 296 GTS features a 2992 cc engine and is available in 14 different colours.
  • Madhuri is known for her impressive car collection, which also includes brands like Mercedes-Maybach and Porsche.
  • She was last seen in the blockbuster film Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, which released on November 1, 2024.
Madhuri's car collection is valued at approximately ₹3.08 crore.

This purchase not only highlights Madhuri's taste for luxurious automobiles but also her status as a prominent figure in Bollywood.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Claims Are FRAUD: Ram Gopal Varma Slams It For 'Insulting' Achievements Of South Cine - Times Now
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Claims Are FRAUD: Ram Gopal Varma Slams It For 'Insulting' Achievements Of South Cinema

Publication Date: Recent, Source: TNN

Filmmaker Ram Gopal Varma has criticized claims regarding the box office success of Game Changer, calling them fraudulent and undermining the achievements of South Indian cinema.

  • Varma expressed outrage over inflated box office numbers that mislead audiences.
  • He stated that the claims disrespect the hard work and success of the industry.
  • Varma referenced other successful films like Bahubali and RRR to highlight South cinema's achievements.
“If @ssrajamouli and @SukumarWritings sky rocketed Telugu cinema in real time collections, the people behind G C succeeded in proving that the south is much more FANTASTIC in being a FRAUD...”

In conclusion, Varma's comments raise concerns about the integrity of box office reporting in the film industry and its effects on public perception.

item.title: The Raja Saab postponed officially; New poster of Prabhas out now - 123telugu
item.description:
The Raja Saab officially postponed; New poster of Prabhas released

Published on: Jan 14, 2025 9:57 am IST

Recently confirmed, The Raja Saab has been postponed from its initial release date of April 10, 2025. The production team is now targeting a June 2025 release, following social media speculation about the delay.

  • The Raja Saab's release has been moved from April 10, 2025, to June 2025.
  • A new poster featuring Prabhas has been unveiled celebrating Sankranthi.
  • Malavika Mohanan makes her Telugu debut in the film, alongside Niddhi Agerwal.
  • Directed by Maruthi and produced by TG Vishwa Prasad under People Media Factory.
Happy Sankranthi Darlings ❤️
Manam yeppudu vasthe appude Asalaina Panduga….Twaralo Chithakkottedham 🔥 #TheRajaSaab will meet you soon in theatres.
- The RajaSaab (@rajasaabmovie) January 14, 2025

The film, billed as a romantic horror comedy, is expected to attract significant attention in its revised release window.
